author: cnbc.com
title: Cementos Pacasmayo Announces First Quarter 2018 Financial Results Call and Webcast
text:
LIMA, Peru--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Cementos Pacasmayo S.A.A. (NYSE: CPAC / BVL: CPACASC1):
Cordially invites you to participate in its First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
Date: Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Time: 11 a.m. Eastern Time/ 10 a.m. Lima Time Presenting for Cementos Pacasmayo: Mr. Humberto Nadal, Chief Executive Officer Mr. Manuel Ferreyros, Chief Financial Officer Ms. Claudia Bustamante, Head of Investor Relations To participate on the day of the call, please dial: (877) 407-0782 from within the U.S. (201) 689-8567 from outside the U.S. A replay of this call will be available through May 25, 2018 To obtain the replay, please call: 1-877-481-4010 from within the U.S. 1-919-882-2331 from outside the U.S. Replay ID: 27467 There will be a live audio webcast of this event available at: http://www.investorcalendar.com/event/27467
A replay of the webcast will be available at the above link for one year following the call
Cementos Pacasmayo plans to release First Quarter 2018 Results on Tuesday, April 24, 2018, after the market closes
For more information please visit www.cementospacasmayo.com.pe/investors/ .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403006044/en/
In Lima, Peru:
